Monster.Name: Giant Eagle
Monster.Description: A giant eagle is a noble creature that speaks its own language and understands speech in the Common tongue. A mated pair of giant eagles typically has up to four eggs or young in their nest (treat the young as normal eagles).

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

MonsterAction.Name: Beak
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Talons
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
